title: Review on Skin Disease Seborrheic Dermatitis Along With Its Treatment and Formulary
details: R Bhujbal, S Musale, M Barge, N Naikawadi - Asian Journal of Pharmaceutical …, 2024
abstract: Seborrheic Dermatitis is common inflammation of the skin, occurring most often on the face, scalp and chest. It is closely related to infantile seborrheic dermatitis, or diaper rash. Seborrheic Dermatitis is particularly common in patient with Parkinson's …
